sn43:1.2.1: Iti kho, bhikkhave, desitaṃ vo mayā asaṅkhataṃ, desito asaṅkhatagāmimaggo.
sn43:1.2.2: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, satthārā karaṇīyaṃ sāvakānaṃ hitesinā anukampakena anukampaṃ upādāya, kataṃ vo taṃ mayā.
sn43:1.2.3: Etāni, bhikkhave, rukkhamūlāni, etāni suññāgārāni. Jhāyatha, bhikkhave, mā pamādattha; mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvattha. Ayaṃ vo amhākaṃ anusāsanī”ti.
sn43:3.1.2: Savitakkasavicāro samādhi, avitakkavicāramatto samādhi, avitakkaavicāro samādhi—ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe….
sn43:4.1.2: Suññato samādhi, animitto samādhi, appaṇihito samādhi—ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe….
sn43:5.1.2: Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe….
sn43:6.1.2: Cattāro sammappadhānā. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe….
sn43:7.1.2: Cattāro iddhipādā. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe….
sn43:9.1.2: Pañca balāni. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe….
sn43:10.1.2: Satta bojjhaṅgā. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe….
sn43:11.1.4: Iti kho, bhikkhave, desitaṃ vo mayā asaṅkhataṃ, desito asaṅkhatagāmimaggo.
sn43:11.1.5: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, satthārā karaṇīyaṃ sāvakānaṃ hitesinā anukampakena anukampaṃ upādāya kataṃ vo taṃ mayā.
sn43:11.1.6: Etāni, bhikkhave, rukkhamūlāni, etāni suññāgārāni. Jhāyatha, bhikkhave, mā pamādattha; mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvattha. Ayaṃ vo amhākaṃ anusāsanī”ti.
sn43:12.1.9: Iti kho, bhikkhave, desitaṃ vo mayā asaṅkhataṃ, desito asaṅkhatagāmimaggo.
sn43:12.1.10: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, satthārā karaṇīyaṃ sāvakānaṃ hitesinā anukampakena anukampaṃ upādāya, kataṃ vo taṃ mayā.
sn43:12.1.11: Etāni, bhikkhave, rukkhamūlāni, etāni suññāgārāni. Jhāyatha, bhikkhave, mā pamādattha; mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvattha. Ayaṃ vo amhākaṃ anusāsanīti. (1.1)
sn43:12.2.1: Asaṅkhatañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi asaṅkhatagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:12.2.9: Iti kho, bhikkhave, desitaṃ vo mayā asaṅkhataṃ …pe…
sn43:12.3.8: Avitakko avicāro samādhi. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe…. (1.3–5.)
sn43:12.4.8: Appaṇihito samādhi. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe…. (1.6–8.)
sn43:12.5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
sn43:12.5.5: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vedanāsu vedanānupassī viharati …pe…
sn43:12.5.8: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu citte cittānupassī viharati …pe…
sn43:12.5.11: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati …pe… ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe…. (1.9–12.)
sn43:12.6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati.
sn43:12.6.5: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati.
sn43:12.6.8: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati.
sn43:12.6.11: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā asammosāya bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya bhāvanāya pāripūriyā chandaṃ janeti vāyamati vīriyaṃ ārabhati cittaṃ paggaṇhāti padahati. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe…. (1.13–16.)
sn43:12.7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti.
sn43:12.7.5: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vīriyasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti.
sn43:12.7.8: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cittasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti.
sn43:12.7.11: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vīmaṃsasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe…. (1.17–20.)
sn43:12.8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhindriyaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ.
sn43:12.8.5: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vīriyindriyaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ …pe…
sn43:12.8.14: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paññindriyaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe…. (1.21–25.)
sn43:12.9.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhābalaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ …pe…
sn43:12.9.14: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paññābalaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe…. (1.26–30.)
sn43:12.10.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satisambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ …pe…
sn43:12.10.10: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo …pe…. (1.31–37.)
sn43:12.11.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammādiṭṭhiṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ.
sn43:12.11.11: asaṅkhatañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi asaṅkhatagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:12.11.15: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammāsamādhiṃ bhāveti vivekanissitaṃ virāganissitaṃ nirodhanissitaṃ vossaggapariṇāmiṃ.
sn43:12.11.17: Iti kho, bhikkhave, desitaṃ vo mayā asaṅkhataṃ, desito asaṅkhatagāmimaggo.
sn43:12.11.18: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, satthārā karaṇīyaṃ sāvakānaṃ hitesinā anukampakena anukampaṃ upādāya, kataṃ vo taṃ mayā.
sn43:12.11.19: Etāni, bhikkhave, rukkhamūlāni, etāni suññāgārāni. Jhāyatha, bhikkhave, mā pamādattha; mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvattha. Ayaṃ vo amhākaṃ anusāsanī”ti. (1.38–45)
sn43:15.1.1: Saccañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi saccagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:16.1.1: Pārañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi pāragāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:17.1.1: Nipuṇañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi nipuṇagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:18.1.1: Sududdasañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi sududdasagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:19.1.1: Ajajjarañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi ajajjaragāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:20.1.1: Dhuvañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi dhuvagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:21.1.1: Apalokitañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi apalokitagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:22.1.1: Anidassanañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi anidassanagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:23.1.1: Nippapañcañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi nippapañcagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:24.1.1: Santañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi santagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:25.1.1: Amatañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi amatagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:26.1.1: Paṇītañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi paṇītagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:27.1.1: Sivañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi sivagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:28.1.1: Khemañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi khemagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:29.1.1: Taṇhākkhayañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi taṇhākkhayagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:30.1.1: Acchariyañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi acchariyagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:31.1.1: Abbhutañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi abbhutagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:32.1.1: Anītikañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi anītikagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:33.1.1: Anītikadhammañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi anītikadhammagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:34.1.1: Nibbānañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi nibbānagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:35.1.1: Abyābajjhañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi abyābajjhagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:36.1.1: Virāgañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi virāgagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:37.1.1: Suddhiñca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi suddhigāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:37.1.2: Taṃ suṇātha. Katamā ca, bhikkhave, suddhi …pe…. (26)
sn43:38.1.1: Muttiñca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi muttigāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:38.1.2: Taṃ suṇātha. Katamā ca, bhikkhave, mutti …pe…. (27)
sn43:39.1.1: Anālayañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi anālayagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:39.1.2: Taṃ suṇātha. Katamo ca, bhikkhave, anālayo …pe…. (28)
sn43:40.1.1: Dīpañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi dīpagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:41.1.1: Leṇañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi leṇagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:42.1.1: Tāṇañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi tāṇagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:43.1.1: Saraṇañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi saraṇagāmiñca maggaṃ.
sn43:44.1.9: Iti kho, bhikkhave, desitaṃ vo mayā parāyanaṃ, desito parāyanagāmimaggo.
sn43:44.1.10: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, satthārā karaṇīyaṃ sāvakānaṃ hitesinā anukampakena anukampaṃ upādāya, kataṃ vo taṃ mayā.
sn43:44.1.11: Etāni, bhikkhave, rukkhamūlāni, etāni suññāgārāni. Jhāyatha, bhikkhave, mā pamādattha; mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvattha. Ayaṃ vo amhākaṃ anusāsanī”ti.
